original_text: You fight and quarrel among yourselves. Do you know why that happens? It is because of the troubles in your thoughts. You want to do bad things that you think will make you happy.
korean_text: 너희 중에 싸움이 어디로부터 다툼이 어디로부터 나느냐 너희 지체 중에서 싸우는 정욕으로부터 나는 것이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: You fight and quarrel among yourselves
Do you know why that happens?
It is because of the troubles in your thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너희 생각 속의 문제 때문이다

sentences.original_text: You want to do bad things
that you think will make you happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너희를 행복하게 할 것이라고 생각한다
